name: Finding Monsters Adventure
description:
Photograph Monsters!
See them do funny things!
Brag best shots online!

Imagine a world made entirely of cloth, buttons and gears, populated by corky fabric monsters. Jake and Tess not only can imagine, but also are trapped in that magical world.

You must help them in this quest snapping all the monsters! Gotta photo'em all!

ஃ Grass, Ice and Moon levels
ஃ Many cute monsters with a lot of personality
ஃ Selfie gameplay for a insta funny faces
ஃ Fireworks because everything looks better with some spark on
ஃ Royale mode to spicy things up
ஃ P-Rex, Scary Harry, Prankster, Glitterbelle and Cuttlesquish; they are all waiting for you!

Story by Martin Olson, a four-time Emmy-nominated writer and composer, who worked on Phineas and Ferb, Rocko's Modern Life and Adventure Time.

Thanks for playing Finding Monsters Adventure and we hope you have a good time! :)
